languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс замирает.{/n} "Что..." {n}Он медленно оборачивается и поднимает взгляд на друкари.{/n} "...ты сказал?"
{n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс замирает.{/n} "Что..." {n}Он медленно оборачивается и поднимает взгляд на друкари.{/n} "...ты сказал?"

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが凍りつく。{/n}「何だと…」{n}彼はゆっくり周囲を見回して、当のデュカーリに視線を移す。{/n}「…何と言った？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが凍りつく。{/n}「何だと…」{n}彼はゆっくり周囲を見回して、当のデュカーリに視線を移す。{/n}「…何と言った？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希停住了。{/n}“你……”{n}他缓缓转身，注视着面前的黑暗灵族。{/n}“……说什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希停住了。{/n}“你……”{n}他缓缓转身，注视着面前的黑暗灵族。{/n}“……说什么？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se fige.{/n} « Que... {n}Il se tourne lentement et lève les yeux vers le Drukhari.{/n} ... qu'avez-vous dit ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se fige.{/n} « Que... {n}Il se tourne lentement et lève les yeux vers le Drukhari.{/n} ... qu'avez-vous dit ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se queda paralizado.{/n} «¿Qué...?». {n}Se da la vuelta lentamente y alza la mirada hacia el Drukhari.{/n} «¿Qué has dicho?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se queda paralizado.{/n} «¿Qué...?». {n}Se da la vuelta lentamente y alza la mirada hacia el Drukhari.{/n} «¿Qué has dicho?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix erstarrt.{/n} "Was ..." {n}Er wendet sich langsam um und richtet seinen Blick auf den Drukhari.{/n} "... habt Ihr gesagt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix erstarrt.{/n} "Was ..." {n}Er wendet sich langsam um und richtet seinen Blick auf den Drukhari.{/n} "... habt Ihr gesagt?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix donakalıyor.{/n} "Ne..." {n}Yavaşça arkasını dönüp bakışlarını Drukhari'ye dikiyor.{/n} "Ne dedin sen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix freezes.{/n} "What..." {n}He slowly turns around and raises his gaze to the Drukhari.{/n} "...did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix donakalıyor.{/n} "Ne..." {n}Yavaşça arkasını dönüp bakışlarını Drukhariye dikiyor.{/n} "Ne dedin sen?"
